current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Defense to provide certain
		  TRICARE beneficiaries with the opportunity to retain access to TRICARE
		  Prime.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 732 of the National Defense
			 Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732

header.#text:
Future availability of
			 TRICARE Prime for certain beneficiaries enrolled in TRICARE Prime

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:b
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:c
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:a
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:b
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:b/p:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall ensure that each affected eligible beneficiary who is
				enrolled in TRICARE Prime as of September 30, 2013, may make a one-time
				election to continue such enrollment in TRICARE Prime, notwithstanding that a
				contract described in

does not allow for such enrollment
				based on the location in which such beneficiary resides. The beneficiary may
				continue such enrollment in TRICARE Prime so long as the beneficiary resides in
				the same ZIP code as the ZIP code in which the beneficiary resided at the time
				of such election.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:a/p:2/sp:A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
,
				the beneficiary may thereafter elect to enroll in TRICARE Standard at any time
				in accordance with a contract described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:b/p:1
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:a/p:2/sp:A

text.#text:
If an
				affected eligible beneficiary makes the one-time election under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:b/p:1
National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:732/ss:c/p:1/sp:B

text.#text:
An affected
				eligible beneficiary may not make the one-time election under
